name: Marking Systems
tag_list: labels, nameplates, graphic-overlays, roll-labels, membrane-switches, prototypes
overview:
MSI was founded in 1970 to serve the Computer, Telecommunications, Electronics, Industrial Machine, Medical, Ad Specialty, Sporting goods, Marine, Measurement/Control and many other industries.

MSI’s specialty is UL/CSA labels, Warning/Caution labels, Nameplates, Graphic Overlays, Membrane Switches, Bar Code labels and Insulators.

MSI is committed to finding the Best People and Latest Technology to provide customers with the Fastest Deliveries, Highest Quality and Lowest Prices in the Label Industry.

Whether your company is a Fortune 500 company or small local manufacturer MSI will take total responsibility to make sure that you receive the right label at the right price for all your applications.
